DOC.brief_summary: The purpose first human ( FIH ) study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( body handle drug ) pharmacodynamics ( drug affect body ) PF-04455242-01 healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A First In Human Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of PF-04455242 In Single Rising Doses In Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) approximately 18 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( > 110 lb ) . Willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , trial procedure . Evidence history clinically significant medical condition allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time screen ) . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 3 month screen positive urine blood cotinine screening . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 7 drinks/week female 14 drinks/week men .
DOC.keyword: healthy volunteer , first human , safety tolerability
